title: Demystifying Artificial Intelligence
notes:
Name of the session: 
Demystifying Artificial Intelligence

Location : Fireside chat near coffee area Open science level 9

Time : 3:15pm-3:45pm

Hashtag : #AI@Mozfest

Github Repo: https://github.com/dvigneshwer/DemystifyingAI

Discussions points :
    
	* Interesting tutorials to get started with Machine learning - Course on machine learning by andrew NG and keras (dataschool.io)
	* Modules involved in Male and Female classification :- keras, numpy, os , sys, matplotlib (keras.io)
	* using crowd ai platforms to get different solution for the problem statement (crowdai.org)
	* Using open data collection standards to properly get data from 3rd party 
	* Discussion about evolutionary algos 
	* Different AI products like google now and facebook image tagging
	* Looked in Lenet architecture
	* Understood the brain model for AI
	* Correlated the brain model with the currenlty existing AI prodicts
	* Need of decentralization in the field of ai
	* Myths about ai
	* Need of understanding and clarity about data policy in data collection services
	* Future of AI - self driving cars, jarvis
	* General steps in how computer vision works

Courses:
http://www.dataschool.io/machine-learning-with-scikit-learn/
https://www.coursera.org/course/neuralnets

Blogs:
https://openai.com/blog/
http://www.kdnuggets.com/
